Description.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT
Description.ExtendedDescription: Strategy for the calculation of soil temperature with the SWAT method. Reference: Neitsch, S.L., Arnold, J.G., Kiniry, J.R., Williams, J.R., King, K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool. Theoretical Documentation. Version 2000. http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf
Description.ShortDescription: Soil temperature by layers computed using the SWAT approach.

Input.name: states_LayerThickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness for each layer [m]

Input.name: states_SoilTemperatureByLayers
Input.description: Previous day's soil temperature of each layer [degC]

Input.name: states_BulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density for each layer [t m-3]

Input.name: states_VolumetricWaterContent
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content for each layer [m3 m-3]

Input.name: LagCoefficient
Input.description: Lag coefficient controlling previous day's influence [-]

Output.name: SoilTemperatureByLayers_out
Output.description: Updated soil temperature of each layer [degC]
